Mailman - Class in <Unnamed>

The MatchWords class implements the random retrieval of the specified number of words to be fed to two players during a match.

QuizzleServer is the core class of the Word Quizzle application.
QuizzleServer(int, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class QuizzleServer
Creates a new QuizzleServer and initializes the dayabase, the threadpool, the selector, the server's TCP and UDP socket channels plus all of the other class fields.

Returns a new QuizzleUser.
